<figure data-orig-width="480" data-orig-height="92" class="tmblr-full"><img data-orig-width="480" data-orig-height="92" src="https://40.media.tumblr.com/e6b9796e0425d604ccf4dd4df2733721/tumblr_inline_nq5r783vqU1rr2wit_540.jpg"/></figure><p><br/></p>

<iframe src="http://www.twitch.tv/teflon_mike/embed" frameborder="0" scrolling="no" height="378" width="620"></iframe>

<p>Many of you will know Teflon Mike from one of the many streams he moderates, but did you know he streams himself as well? Wander into <a href="http://www.twitch.tv/teflon_mike"><b>his channel</b></a> and ask him where his obsession with potatoes comes from!<br/></p>
Oh hey, he's streaming right now! Perfect timing.
